definition[0]: antisocial behaviour is violent or harmful to other people, or shows that you do not care about other people
example[0]: She was finding it hard to cope with her son’s increasingly antisocial behaviour.
definition[1]: someone who is antisocial does not enjoy meeting or being with other people
example[2]: If I don’t go tonight, everyone will accuse me of being antisocial.
definition[2]: an activity or job that is antisocial does not give you the chance to meet other people
example[3]: I got fed up with the low pay and antisocial hours.
